statements: SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_deliveries;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE source_location = 'Farm A';
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT destination_location, source_location FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE destination_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, destination_location FROM farm_to_table_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE source_location = 'Farm A'
SELECT delivery_id, destination_location, delivery_date FROM farm_to_table_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE destination_location LIKE '%Market%'
SELECT delivery_id, source_location, destination_location FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE delivery_date <= '2021-10-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM farm_to_table_deliveries WHERE destination_location = 'Restaurant X'
SELECT * FROM FarmDeliveries;
SELECT delivery_id, source_farm, destination_table FROM FarmDeliveries WHERE source_farm='Farm A';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM FarmDeliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time FROM FarmDeliveries WHERE source_farm='Farm B' AND destination_table='Table C';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryTracking WHERE location='Warehouse' ORDER BY tracking_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM FarmDeliveries WHERE source_farm = 'Farm A' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, delivery_time ASC;
SELECT source_farm, COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM FarmDeliveries GROUP BY source_farm HAVING total_deliveries > 5;
SELECT delivery_id, source_farm, destination_table, DATE_FORMAT(delivery_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM FarmDeliveries WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dt.tracking_id, dt.location, fd.source_farm FROM DeliveryTracking dt JOIN FarmDeliveries fd ON dt.delivery_id = fd.delivery_id ORDER BY dt.tracking_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmDeliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM farm_products;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id FROM farm_products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, delivery_date FROM farm_products WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id, delivery_date FROM farm_products;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT route_id, supplier_id, driver_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM delivery_routes;

SELECT product_name, supplier_name, contact_email, phone_number, delivery_status FROM farm_products JOIN suppliers ON farm_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN delivery_routes ON suppliers.supplier_id = delivery_routes.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, delivery_date FROM farm_products LEFT JOIN suppliers ON farm_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryRoutes;
SELECT route_id, origin_address, destination_address FROM DeliveryRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, delivery_time FROM DeliveryRoutes WHERE destination_address = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM DeliveryStatus ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT route_id, log_message, log_time FROM DeliveryLogs WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryRoutes;
SELECT route_id, origin_address, destination_address FROM DeliveryRoutes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryLogs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_id, count(log_id) AS log_count FROM DeliveryLogs GROUP BY route_id HAVING log_count > 5;

SELECT ds.status_id, dr.origin_address, dl.log_message FROM DeliveryStatus ds JOIN DeliveryRoutes dr ON ds.route_id = dr.route_id JOIN DeliveryLogs dl ON ds.route_id = dl.route_id ORDER BY dl.log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email FROM customers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 5 ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
